definition: body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158

sentences.english: Anson Chan decried the comments by Tsang as a "provocation and personal attack".
sentences.chinese: 陈方安生谴责曾德成的言论是挑衅及人身攻击。

sentences.english: Person-oriented argumentation and fallacy of personal abuse should be distinguished.
sentences.chinese: “针对人的”论证与“人身攻击”谬误应加以区分。

sentences.english: Ad hominem is a blunt tool for cheappropagandists.
sentences.chinese: 人身攻击是最低级别的政治宣传方式。

sentences.english: It’s only too easy to misinterpret a critical comment about a piece of work as a personal attack.
sentences.chinese: 对于一项工作的批评太容易被误解为人身攻击了。

sentences.english: I didn't expect him to descend to personal abuse.
sentences.chinese: 我没料到他会堕落到对我进行人身攻击的地步。

sentences.english: To Enrage or exasperate someone is to write an abusive personal attack.
sentences.chinese: 激怒或激怒某人写辱骂人身攻击。

sentences.english: Crimes of violence and attacks on the person require more or less pluck .
sentences.chinese: 造谣惑众和人身攻击是多多少少需要有一些勇气的。

sentences.english: When overcoming objections, he often "experiences" as personal attacks.
sentences.chinese: 力排众议之时，他常有倍受人身攻击之感。

sentences.english: Q and your just twisted is an insult added on. P unless Q.
sentences.chinese: 你就扭了，加上了人身攻击，P除非。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, I have chosen not to respond to personal attack launched by MCA President.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，我选择不回应马华总会长的人身攻击。

sentences.english: Personal attacks or purposeless inflammatory posts is not allowed.
sentences.chinese: 禁止人身攻击或是笔战。

definition: to hurl abuse/to deride/to call sb names
to discuss sth on its own merits/to judge the matter as it stands
to criticize (as a matter of principle)
to swear or curse (at people)/to scold or yell at someone
to criticize/to find fault with/to denounce
to speak sarcastically/to make cutting remarks
